title: (x) Made To Scale unicase book cover type - Filosofia {Yves}
content:
A coworker asked and I said "oh that's...um"

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012232434/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_50.png) | 17.66 KB |
author: grod

comments.content: And if you feel like cranking up the dial to eleven, check [Gareth Hague](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012232434/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Gareth%20Hague)'s [La Perla](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012232434/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=ALT0000117#specimen).
Thanks Yves. The entire office went "oh, of course" as soon as I read your post aloud. La Perla looks lovely, too.

Noah, get your company to make a donation to Typophile! :-)  
(Please read that aloud too. :-)

hhp
